div.div: Can the U.S. military find a few thousand good hackers?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WMXLfd&via=Digg&text=Uncle Spam Wants You!

div.a: The 'Unflattering' Photos Beyonce's Publicist Doesn't Want You To See

div.div: After Beyonce's Super Bowl halftime show, we posted this piece about how fierce she was. Then this email came in. In what world are these shots unflattering?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12qTPrs&via=Digg&text=The 'Unflattering' Photos Beyonce's Publicist Doesn't Want You To See

div.div: The baby baller is named Titus and in a trick-shot video posted to YouTube Sunday, the 2-year-old exhibits the defiance of Lebron James and the scary accuracy of Reggie Miller as he sinks jumpers in the face of his older siblings and swooshes more than five baskets in a row.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UucSz0&via=Digg&text=2-Year-Old's Trick-Shot Video Wins The Internet

div.a: Doctors Are Taking Women's Wombs For No Reason In India

div.div: Thousands of Indian women are having their wombs removed in operations that campaigners say are unnecessary and only performed to make money for unscrupulous private doctors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11RZzGf&via=Digg&text=Doctors Are Taking Women's Wombs For No Reason In India

div.div: WELL, HE EATS HIS OWN POOP
Is your dog a genius or a dolt? Here's how to find out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y7queW&via=Digg&text=How Smart Is Your Dog?

div.a: Frank Ocean: Chris Brown Threatened To Shoot Me

div.div: Frank Ocean told police he was called a "f*ggot" during his brawl with Chris Brown... moments before Brown threatened to shoot him.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XKtbE4&via=Digg&text=Frank Ocean: Chris Brown Threatened To Shoot Me

div.a: Why Amazon Wants Its Own Currency

div.div: Coins are the latest attempt to shore up loyalty... and maybe avoid some taxes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12qAcjq&via=Digg&text=Why Amazon Wants Its Own Currency

div.a: A Pixar Animator Sketches The NFL Season

div.div: Austin Madison is an animator for Pixar, and has worked on movies including "Ratatouille," "Toy Story 3," and "Up." But this is perhaps his finest work: a series of sketches throughout the NFL season, previewing one or two of each week's games

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WYuaCq&via=Digg&text=A Pixar Animator Sketches The NFL Season

div.a: Disney Planning 'Star Wars' Spinoffs For Different Characters

div.div: Disney, which announced it would buy Lucasfilm last year, plans to make spinoff movies based on characters in addition to the three sequels it had previously announced, CEO Bob Iger told CNBC in an interview.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WsBze5&via=Digg&text=Disney Planning 'Star Wars' Spinoffs For Different Characters

div.a: LeBron James Is Underpaid By The Heat And Nike

div.div: James has never been the highest paid player in the league and his $17.6 million salary ranks No. 13 this year, despite his clear stature as the best player in the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YRgaxx&via=Digg&text=LeBron James Is Underpaid By The Heat And Nike

div.a: How Do Researchers Feed Thousands Of Bloodthirsty Bed Bugs?

div.div: When the common bed bug staged its comeback over a decade ago, scientists hadn't really studied the insect for about forty years. Once it was clear bed bugs weren't going away, researchers who wanted to learn how to thwart them first had to figure out how to keep thousands--or hundreds of thousands--alive in the lab. The first trick was to feed them. Bed bugs eat just one thing: blood.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WZ1ZmT&via=Digg&text=How Do Researchers Feed Thousands Of Bloodthirsty Bed Bugs?

div.a: Going From 'Suck To Non-Suck' As A Public Speaker

div.div: If you want to improve your public speaking, are you prepared to put yourself out there repeatedly to improve?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11BzTlF&via=Digg&text=Going From 'Suck To Non-Suck' As A Public Speaker

div.a: Anderson Cooper Confronted By Sandy Hook Truther

div.div: A Sandy Hook truther who believes the massacre was staged confronts Anderson Cooper over a supposed missing nose in a live shot.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12mbh0l&via=Digg&text=Anderson Cooper Confronted By Sandy Hook Truther

div.div: THINGS ARE NOT WHAT THEY SEEM

div.a: 20 Optical Illusions That Might Break Your Mind

div.div: Viewer discretion advised! Do not click unless your brain is made of steel and your nerves are Teflon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XlMeDa&via=Digg&text=20 Optical Illusions That Might Break Your Mind

div.a: The Groundbreaking Technology Set To Revolutionize Privacy And Terrify Governments

div.div: For the past few months, some of the world’s leading cryptographers have been keeping a closely guarded secret about a pioneering new invention. Today, they’ve decided it’s time to tell all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TA9pNQ&via=Digg&text=The Groundbreaking Technology Set To Revolutionize Privacy And Terrify Governments

div.a: Most Facebook Users Have Taken A Break From The Site

div.div: Facebook is the most popular social network in America — roughly two-thirds of adults in the country use it on a regular basis. But that doesn’t mean they don’t get sick of it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11nrqDp&via=Digg&text=Most Facebook Users Have Taken A Break From The Site

div.a: How A 'Free WiFi For All!' Myth Was Born

div.div: The corpse has been outlined with chalk, but like a zombie it refuses to lie down. Under a “new” plan from the FCC, cities across America would be blanketed with “Super WiFi” capable of making mobile phone calls without a cell phone provider or a bill.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XKTI4i&via=Digg&text=How A 'Free WiFi For All!' Myth Was Born

div.a: Google's Latest Chrome Experiment Lets You Journey To Oz

div.div: Google today unveiled Find Your Way to Oz, a collaboration with Disney and the latest addition to the company's series of Chrome Experiments that harness the latest internet technologies.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y8biyf&via=Digg&text=Google's Latest Chrome Experiment Lets You Journey To Oz

div.a: How To Freak Out Responsibly About The Rise Of The Robots

div.div: It's fun to imagine an economy where machines are smarter than humans. But we don't need an artificial crisis over artificial intelligence.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XJEX1v&via=Digg&text=How To Freak Out Responsibly About The Rise Of The Robots

div.a: Which City Has The Worst Traffic In The U.S.?

div.div: The Texas A&M Transportation Institute has released its annual traffic study.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WNpL2w&via=Digg&text=Which City Has The Worst Traffic In The U.S.?

div.a: Who Killed Sweden's Prime Minister—27 Years Ago?

div.div: Almost 27 years ago, Prime Minister Olof Palme was gunned down on a Stockholm street as he walked to the movies with his wife. The case has never been solved and draws comparisons with the assassination of JFK for its notoriety and legion of conspiracy theories.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XKzLe3&via=Digg&text=Who Killed Sweden's Prime Minister—27 Years Ago?

div.a: All The Struggle Of Being An Artist, In A Video Game

div.div: “Art game” is a relatively recent coinage that can refer to a very artistic video game — "Flower," for example. But it’s also the title of indie developer Pippin Barr’s latest creation, which takes its name extremely literally. Barr has turned the art world into a video game.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UufVY0&via=Digg&text=All The Struggle Of Being An Artist, In A Video Game

div.a: The Most Beautiful GIFs On The Internet

div.div: Digital artist Paolo Čerić's experiments with processing and digital art have resulted in a steady stream of fascinating animations which he publishes on his blog.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W3sPKf&via=Digg&text=The Most Beautiful GIFs On The Internet

div.a: Ten Cool Things To Do With Your Newly-Jailbroken iOS Device

div.div: We're not saying you should jailbreak your iOS device. But if you did, here are some things worth checking out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y6crWM&via=Digg&text=Ten Cool Things To Do With Your Newly-Jailbroken iOS Device

div.div: There were times and places in North Korea in the mid-1990s, as a great famine wiped out perhaps 10 percent of the population, that children feared to sleep in the open. It wasn’t unusual for people to disappear; they were dying by the thousands, maybe millions. But dark rumors were spreading, too horrifying to believe, too persistent to ignore.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VBiAdl&via=Digg&text=The Cannibals Of North Korea

div.div: The recent surge in cybercrime comes with a silver lining: Bank robberies are plummeting, as criminals seem to wise up to the fact that heists just don't pay like they used to.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12oWSQW&via=Digg&text=Crime That No Longer Pays

div.a: Will Your Partner Leak Your Secrets?

div.div: Twelve percent of people have had their passwords, bank account numbers, or sexy photos leaked by an angry ex, according to a survey by McAfee. The top reason: lying.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yyz9cj&via=Digg&text=Will Your Partner Leak Your Secrets?

div.a: The Last Place Lance Can Race

div.div: During his televised interview last month with Oprah Winfrey, Lance Armstrong expressed contrition for doping during his cycling career and for bullying those who tried to expose him. But on Strava, a social network that lets athletes of all levels challenge each other, Armstrong appears unbowed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TCJa9k&via=Digg&text=The Last Place Lance Can Race

div.div: ALWAYS MONEY IN THE BANANA SETTLEMENT

div.a: Banana Mogul Allegedly Refused To Call 911 For Dying Three-Way Sex Partner

div.div: A hard-partying banana mogul repeatedly refused to call for an ambulance after a woman he plied with cocaine fatally overdosed during a three-way sex romp at a Park Avenue hotel, a cop testified yesterday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11mkrdR&via=Digg&text=Banana Mogul Allegedly Refused To Call 911 For Dying Three-Way Sex Partner

div.a: Model Trains And The Secret Of Happiness

div.div: The world is a foul and meaningless place full of pimps and mutant wolves. And who isn’t f*cked up and miserable about that fact? People with hobbies.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UUUDAp&via=Digg&text=Model Trains And The Secret Of Happiness

div.a: World's Tiniest Car Is Terrifying, Fantastic, Makes You Look Like A LEGO Astronaut

div.div: In the latest episode of the BBC show Top Gear, host Jeremy Clarkson unveils the world's tiniest car, the P45, which he apparently designed himself.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WoHkHM&via=Digg&text=World's Tiniest Car Is Terrifying, Fantastic, Makes You Look Like A LEGO Astronaut

div.a: The Rarest Play In The NFL

div.div: Sunday's game was probably the closest we’ll ever get to a Super Bowl fair-catch kick.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11Lh2Qk&via=Digg&text=The Rarest Play In The NFL

div.a: How One Company Reinvented The Hand Dryer

div.div: Excel Dryer in East Longmeadow, Massachusetts makes one of the most popular hand driers in the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VFJciA&via=Digg&text=How One Company Reinvented The Hand Dryer

div.a: Bizarre Propaganda Video Shows North Korea Bombing The U.S. In A Spaceship

div.div: According to this video, North Koreans dream about flying in space ships and bombing the United States all set to 'We Are The World.'

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VBbfKU&via=Digg&text=Bizarre Propaganda Video Shows North Korea Bombing The U.S. In A Spaceship
